mapper.select: SELECT e.employeeID ,e.positionID ,e.name,e.status ,e.joinDate ,e.phoneNumber ,e.address ,e.remainingAnnualLeave ,e.departmentID ,r.responName,e.rankID,h.branchID,d.departmentName,f.serverFileName FROM department d JOIN headquarters h ON d.hqID = h.hqID JOIN employee e ON e.departmentID = d.departmentID JOIN responsibility r ON r.responID = e.responID LEFT OUTER JOIN file f ON e.employeeID = f.idx where e.employeeID= #{param1} and f.path='profile'
select password FROM employee WHERE employeeID = #{param1}
